features: Ultra-lightweight fire starter designed for one-handed use; ideal tool for ultralight backpacking, hunting, camping and emergency preparedness
Ignites a wide range of tinders; sparks can be generated in rain or other adverse weather conditions
Generates sparks three times hotter than a normal match
Spring-loaded flint based bar will last over 100 strikes
Durable plastic stands up to rugged use
